name: Indiana Bones (James Trawick)
description:
Venture out into the jungle, and find the mystical golden whip to complete your cosplay. In this 2D Action Platformer explore setpieces ranging from a giant waterfall to a mysterious temple, and encounter dangerous tiki foes. To combat the challenges of the jungle wield one of your trusty bones with a melee attack that also serves as a dash, and a ranged attack by throwing one of your bones at the cost of your health. You will also need to Play Dead which will allow you to evade all attacks while being unable to move.

========================================================

Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys (KeyBoard) | Control Stick (Controller)

Jump: W, Up Arrow, or Space Bar (KeyBoard) | A button (Controller)

Play Dead: S or Down Arrow (KeyBoard) | X Button (Controller)

Melee Attack: Left Click (KeyBoard) | Right Bumper (Controller)

Ranged Attack: Right Click (KeyBoard) | Left Bumper (Controller)
